Package org.radarbase.management.repository

Interface SubjectRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Subject,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Subject,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Subject,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Subject>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Subject,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.history.RevisionRepository<Subject,​java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer>
    @RepositoryDefinition(domainClass=Subject.class,
                      idClass=java.lang.Long.class)
public interface SubjectRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Subject,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.history.RevisionRepository<Subject,​java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer>
    Spring Data JPA repository for the Subject entity.
